Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. It's a high-quality item that we believe is worth more than its value to you. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I propose a special introductory price of $140 for you. This is an exclusive offer tailored to valued individuals like yourself. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the superior quality and functionality of our product. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
